mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, t2.region_num, t3.bld_num FROM view_divisionInfo t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(1) region_num, division_code FROM view_regioninfo WHERE state = '0000' GROUP BY division_code) t2 ON t1.division_code = t2.division_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(1) bld_num, division_code FROM view_regioninfo vr INNER JOIN view_regbld ar on vr.region_id = ar.region_id WHERE vr.state = '0000' GROUP BY division_code) t3 ON t1.division_code = t3.division_code
SELECT t.bld_id, t2.bld_name || '#', t.region_id FROM view_regbld t LEFT JOIN View_BldInfo t2 on t.bld_id = t2.bld_id WHERE t.region_id = #{regionId}

SELECT t.project_id, t.bld_no, t.cell_no, case when instr(t.cell_name, 'B') > 0 then t.cell_name when instr(t1.bld_name, '地下') > 0 THEN 'B' || t.cell_name ELSE t.cell_name || '单元' END cell_name, FROM view_houseinfo t LEFT JOIN view_bldinfo t1 ON t.bld_no = t1.bld_no AND t.project_id = t1.project_id WHERE t.project_id in (select a.project_id from view_regbld a where a.region_id = #{regionId}) GROUP BY t.project_id, t.bld_no, t.cell_no, t1.bld_name, t.cell_name ORDER BY t.project_id, t.bld_no, t.cell_no, t1.bld_name, t.cell_name

SELECT nvl(floor_no, '-') floor_no, case when instr(floor_name, '层') > 0 THEN floor_name else floor_name || '层' end as floor_name, COUNT(1) total_num, sum(case when presell_state = '已售' or presell_state = '已受理' then 1 else 0 END) sell_num, sum(case when presell_state = '未售' and sales_flag = '是' then 1 else 0 END) nosaled_num, sum(case when sales_flag != '是' and presell_state = '未售' then 1 else 0 END) nosale_num FROM view_houseinfo t WHERE t.project_id = #{projectId} AND t.bld_no = #{bldNo} AND t.cell_name = #{cellNo} GROUP BY floor_no, floor_name ORDER BY CASE WHEN instr(t.floor_no, '阁楼') > 0 or instr(t.floor_no, '顶') > 0 then 9999 when regexp_replace(t.floor_no,'^[-\+]?\d+(\.\d+)?$','') is not null then -100 else to_number(t.floor_no) end DESC

SELECT t.project_id, t.bld_no, t.cell_name cell_no, case when instr(t.cell_name, 'B') > 0 then t.cell_name when instr(t.bld_no, '地下') > 0 THEN 'B' || t.cell_name ELSE t.cell_name || '单元' END cell_name, count(1) total_num, SUM(CASE WHEN presell_state = '已售' or presell_state = '已受理' then 1 else 0 end) sell_num, sum(case when sales_flag = '否' then 1 else 0 end) no_sale_num, SUM(case when mortgage_flag = '是' then 1 else 0 end) mortgage_num, SUM(case when close_flag = '是' then 1 else 0 end) close_num, SUM(case when frozen_flag = '是' then 1 else 0 end) frozen_num, sum(case when presell_state = '未售' and sales_flag = '是' then 1 else 0 end) no_saled_num FROM view_houseinfo t WHERE t.project_id = #{projectId} and t.bld_no = #{bldNo} AND t.cell_name = #{cellNo} GROUP BY t.project_id, t.bld_no, t.cell_no, t.cell_name

SELECT t.*, CASE WHEN mortgage_flag = '是' THEN '抵押' WHEN close_flag = '是' THEN '查封' WHEN frozen_flag = '是' THEN '关闭' WHEN presell_state = '已售' THEN '已售' WHEN presell_state = '关闭' THEN '关闭' WHEN presell_state = '已受理' THEN '签订中' WHEN sales_flag = '否' THEN t.nosale_reason WHEN presell_state = '未售' THEN '未售' ELSE '其他' END presell_state_name, CASE WHEN mortgage_flag = '是' THEN 'ddb400' WHEN close_flag = '是' THEN 'dd6600' WHEN frozen_flag = '是' THEN 'dd8800' WHEN presell_state = '已受理' THEN '03c2dd' WHEN presell_state = '已售' THEN 'dd6a62' WHEN presell_state = '关闭' THEN '959595' WHEN sales_flag = '否' THEN '959595' WHEN presell_state = '未售' THEN '00dd02' ELSE '00dd02' END presell_state_code FROM view_houseinfo t WHERE t.project_id = #{projectId} AND t.bld_no = #{bldNo} and t.cell_name = #{cellNo} AND t.floor_no = #{floorNo}

SELECT project_id, bld_no, bld_name, view_path, max(house_num) cell_floor_num FROM ( SELECT t1.project_id, t1.bld_no, t1.bld_name, t2.house_num, t3.view_path FROM view_bldinfo t1 LEFT JOIN view_regbld t3 on t1.project_id = t3.project_id and t1.bld_no = t3.bld_no LEFT JOIN (SELECT project_id, bld_no, count(1) over(partition BY bld_no, cell_name, floor_no) house_num FROM view_houseinfo WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND bld_no = #{bldNo}) t2 ON t1.project_id = t2.project_id AND t1.bld_no = t2.bld_no WHERE t1.project_id = #{projectId} AND t1.bld_no = #{bldNo}) GROUP BY project_id, bld_no, bld_name, view_path
